content.question: Which of the following will occur as a result of a decrease in the prices of the inputs used to produce a good?

choices.label: The quantity supplied would increase at each possible price for the good.
The price of the good would increase for any given quantity supplied.
The quantity supplied would increase as the price of the good increased.
The quantity supplied would increase as the price of the good decreased.
The price of the good would increase as the quantity supplied decreased.

content.answer: The quantity supplied would increase at each possible price for the good.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
